hero.title: Cooperative of
hero.subtitle: Transforming lives through environmental education and building a sustainable future for the next generations.

about.title: About
about.description1: For over 25 years, the Repensar Environmental Education Cooperative has worked tirelessly to promote environmental awareness through innovative educational programs and sustainable community projects.
about.description2: Our mission is to create a network of conscious and engaged individuals in environmental preservation, developing projects that unite education, sustainability and social transformation.

programs.title: Our
programs.subtitle: We develop comprehensive programs that address different aspects of environmental education

program1.title: Sustainable Children's Education
program1.description: Educational programs for children about environmental preservation and sustainability.

program2.title: Community Recycling
program2.description: Recycling and reuse initiatives in local communities.

program3.title: Urban Reforestation
program3.description: Tree planting projects and creation of urban green spaces.

stats.title: Our Impact
stats.subtitle: Numbers that represent our dedication to the environmental cause

volunteer.title: Become a
volunteer.subtitle: Join our mission and make a difference in the environment through our platforms

desktop.title: Desktop
desktop.description: Access our complete volunteering platform through your computer with all available features.

android.title: Android
android.description: Download our Android app and participate in environmental actions directly from your smartphone.

ios.title: iOS
ios.description: Available on the App Store, our iOS app offers a complete experience for volunteers.

whyVolunteer.title: Why volunteer?
whyVolunteer.description: As a Repensar volunteer, you will have the opportunity to participate in environmental impact projects, develop new skills and be part of a community committed to sustainability.

team.title: Our
team.subtitle: Professionals dedicated to transformation through environmental education

contact.title: Get in
contact.subtitle: Join us in the mission to create a more sustainable future

Dashboard.subtitle: Here's what's happening with your projects today.

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By accessing and using the Repensar Environmental Education Cooperative platform, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

section2.title: 2. Use of Services
section2.content: Our platform is designed to facilitate environmental education and volunteer activities. You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of others or restrict their use of the platform.

section3.title: 3. User Accounts
section3.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

section4.title: 4. Intellectual Property
section4.content: All content, trademarks, and data on this platform, including but not limited to software, databases, text, graphics, icons, and hyperlinks, are the property of or licensed to Repensar and are protected by applicable laws.

section5.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
section5.content: Repensar will not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use or inability to use the service. We provide our services on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis.

section6.title: 6. Changes to Terms
section6.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes. Your continued use of the platform after such modifications constitutes your acceptance of the updated terms.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including your name, email address, phone number, and any other information you choose to provide when registering or using our platform.

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to communicate with you, to monitor and analyze trends and usage, and to personalize your experience on our platform.

section3.title: 3. Information Sharing
section3.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as necessary to provide our services or as required by law.

section4.title: 4. Data Security
section4.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized or unlawful processing, accidental loss, destruction, or damage.

section5.title: 5. Your Rights
section5.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also object to or restrict certain processing of your data. To exercise these rights, please contact us at cea.repensar@gmail.com.

section6.title: 6. Changes to Privacy Policy
section6.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date.
